At the moment I am mainly working and experimenting with sound, music and art interventions that make some noise. I am interested in small concepts, live-electronics, instrument building, real time audio programming languages and some other things!!

CONTACT:
paul(AT)lefant.net


NEXT:
26-28.6. - velak export at atelier claus, bruxelles
